    • Uses of Log4jCapturer.LogAssertion in org.libex.test.logging.log4j

      Methods in org.libex.test.logging.log4j that return Log4jCapturer.LogAssertion 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Log4jCapturer.LogAssertion Log4jCapturer.LogAssertion.isLogged()
      Sets the assertion to expect the message to be logged.
      Log4jCapturer.LogAssertion Log4jCapturer.LogAssertion.isNotLogged()
      Sets the assertion to expect the message to NOT be logged.
      static Log4jCapturer.LogAssertion Log4jCapturer.LogAssertion.newLogAssertion() 
      Log4jCapturer.LogAssertion Log4jCapturer.LogAssertion.withException(org.hamcrest.Matcher<? super Throwable> exception)
      Sets the assertion to expect the logging event to contain an exception that matches the passed exception.
      Log4jCapturer.LogAssertion Log4jCapturer.LogAssertion.withLevel(org.apache.log4j.Level level)
      Sets the assertion to expect the message to have the passed level.
      Log4jCapturer.LogAssertion Log4jCapturer.LogAssertion.withLevel(org.hamcrest.Matcher<? super org.apache.log4j.Level> level)
      Sets the assertion to expect the message to have a level that matches the passed level.
      Log4jCapturer.LogAssertion Log4jCapturer.LogAssertion.withRenderedMessage(org.hamcrest.Matcher<? super String> message)
      Sets the assertion to expect the rendered (formatted) message to match the passed message.
      Log4jCapturer.LogAssertion Log4jCapturer.LogAssertion.withRenderedMessage(String substring)
      Sets the assertion to expect the rendered (formatted) message to have a message that is super-string of the passed substring.
      Methods in org.libex.test.logging.log4j with parameters of type Log4jCapturer.LogAssertion 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Iterable<org.apache.log4j.spi.LoggingEvent> Log4jCapturer.getLogs(Log4jCapturer.LogAssertion assertion)
      Gets the list of logs that matches the passed assertion
